msbt.message: Hey hey hey! Welcome to your one and only gateway to the skies, the Airport. Nice to meetcha—I'm Orville, ground crew for Dodo Airlines.Dodo Airlines: the crew may be flightlessbut that doesn't mean YOU have to be!
If you want to visit another island or invite friends to this one, this here's the place to do it.
If you want to visit another island, invite friends to this one, or go on a Mystery Tour, this is the place to be.

Oh! And we've also got a mail service at this airport! Sometimes a letter's just better, you know?If you want to send someone a note, take a gander to your right. We got all kinds of cards at the card stand!
By the way you're , right?It's a small island. Word gets around.
I just got a Nook Miles Ticket from Tom Nook with "" written on it, which makes it yours.So if you want to use this ticket, you just gotta say the magic words "I wanna fly!" Got it?
So yeah, we've got a lotta services here, but we can only offer 'em to residents. It can be in a tent, but you gotta live on the island. Come talk to me when you're squared away on that.

Hey, look—I've been yappin' my beak for a while and you're busy playin' with your human friends. Sorry. But if you wanna visit another island or invite folks here, just come back when you're not quite sosociable.
So. . You got anything to tell me?
Hey hey hey! Welcome to your one and only gateway to the skies, the Airport. How can I help you out today?
Hey there again! What can I do you for?
By the way, I got a Nook Miles Ticket with your name on it behind the desk here, so use that whenever.
By the way, it looks like you've got a Nook Miles Ticket on you, in case you feel like using that.
Sojust to get the paperwork all official, where didja want to go?
By the way, I got a Nook Miles Ticket with your name on it behind the desk here, so use that whenever.
Sojust to get the paperwork all official, where didja want to go?
Sojust to get the paperwork all official, where didja want to go?
Hey hey hey! Welcome to your one and only gateway to the skies, the Airport. Oh, it's you! Good timing!

Hang on a sec—how'd you get in here? Coulda swore I locked the front doorEh, doesn't matter. We're still getting set up in here, sothere's no flights today.Sorry 'bout that. Should be open for flights tomorrow, though, so be sure to come back then!
Oh, you need to know what a Nook Miles Ticket is good for? Friend, you've asked the right dodo.

The Nook Miles Ticket is good for one Mystery Tour, a journey to the farthest reaches of the imagination! Could be anywhere from tiny islands to atolls—there are no limits! Just any rock our pilot DARES to land on! We created this service for TRUE fans of uncharted land—for these folks, no island can be deserted ENOUGH. You can harvest anything you want, so bring your tools. And who knows, you might meet your next neighbor! Tickets available only at Nook Stop. Offer void where prohibited. Dodo Airlines does not assume responsibility for anything, ever.
Aaaand that about sums up the epic thrill ride we call the Dodo Airlines Mystery Tour!So we can leave right now, if you got your tools ready and everything. Whaddaya say?
So you wanna use your Nook Miles Ticket? Roger!
In that case, I'll just take this ticket I got from Tom Nook
I'm ready to get you in the sky right this minute, but let's just check— you all packed? Tools all ready?

<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />Dodo One, this is Dodo Tower—Wilbur, you copy? Got a walker who needs wings, over. Roger! Ready when you are!<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="40" />OK—have a good flight, friend! And when you need to travel, just think, "What would dodos do?"
Oh yeah, I totally understand! Go get yourself prepped and ready before setting off, friend.Just come on back when you've got all your ducks in a row—er, so to speak.
Ah! So you wanna go visit somebody on another island?
Ah, you wanna have company over? Sounds like fun!

So, the first time you connect with folks on another island, whether letting them in or visiting 'em The legal eagles say I gotta make sure you see some important info.It's kinda long, but it's a big deal, so please read the whole thing.
Thanks for sticking with me through the yawnfest there. Let's move on to the next step
Sounds good!Oh, and sorry if we showed you this before, but the legal eagles say we gotta before someone plays online.
You wanna head to a nearby island on local play, or some far-off island using online play?
Oh, drumsticks Looks like there aren't any islands we can take you to right now Sorry about that.
Oh, hang on—which island you wanna go to?
Looks like we got a flight for right now That where you wanted to go?
OK, I found a place called but it's at full capacity and not taking visitors.
Hang on! You need a special Dodo Code™ to visit this island.<10_4 /> Couldja gimme those four digits?
Oooh! Looks like that's not the Dodo Code™. You wanna try entering it again?
Wuh-oh! Looks like we're getting interference Hang on Someone not put their NookPhone into airplane mode again?
Wuh-oh! Looks like we're getting interference Hang on Someone not put their NookPhone into airplane mode again?
Alrighty then—you're all set! And when you need to travel, just think, "What would dodos do?"<10_7 arg="60" />
You wanna invite someone from a nearby island on local play or one from a far-off island via online play?
Alright, gimme a sec to set up local play.
You got it! I'll turn off the internet connection and set things up for local play.
So, you want me to fling open the gates and let anyone using local play to come on in?Or set a special Dodo Code™ to keep out the riffraff?
You got it! Openin' the gate now
You got it! Openin' the gate now

See, we can't take off for an island if someone there is in the middle of talking or workin' on something. If you try a few times and it keeps not connecting, you might wanna just try it again later. Oh, but if you can get ahold of your host a different way, it might be quicker to send 'em a message! Maybe something like, "I wanna come visit, but first I need you to stop chatting and close your NookPhone." Just be sure to be diplomatic about it. Everybody gets lost in their phone sometimes, right?
So did you want me to try again right now?

See, we can't take off from an island if someone here is in the middle of talking or workin' on something. If you try a few times and it keeps not connecting, you might wanna just try it again later. Oh, but if you can get ahold of your host a different way, it might be quicker to send 'em a message! Maybe something like, "I wanna take off, but first I need you to stop chatting and close your NookPhone." Just be sure to be diplomatic about it. Everybody gets lost in their phone sometimes, right?
So did you want me to try again right now?
Alright, here we go! Openin' the gate now.

Looks like you're busy doing Island Designer stuff.Sorry, but the regs say we can't let you use the Island Designer app during flights or network play. So I gotta shut that down for you. Thanks for understanding.
Hey, thanks for humoring us! The dodos at the other airports tease us when we make a mess.
Oh, dang it! Looks like I forgot to check if you were using your Island Designer app. You can't use that app during flights or network play, so I'll go ahead and shut it down for ya

Just so you know, the gate's open, so visitors might show up anytime.There might even be folks you don't know—it's a big ocean full of islands out there, after all. So if you're playing with a pal and you want to keep out the rabble, let me know and I'll close the gate. Alright, you go enjoy yourself. Don't dodo anything I wouldn't dodo!
Just give your Dodo Code™, , to anybody you want to invite. Makin' friends has never been so easy!
Gotcha. Lemme just connect you to the ol' internet for some online play, then
Well, dang. Someone went and closed the gate over there.
You wanna try going someplace else? I can search again.
Hey there again! What can I do you for?
Hey there again! What can I do you for?
Hey there again! What can I do you for?
Hey there again! What can I do you for?
Hey there again! What can I do you for?
Hey there again! What can I do you for?
Oh, so instead of having visitors, you wanna do some traveling?
So you want to stop communication and close the gate? Well, we don't have any visitors, so no problem!
Sure thing! The code right now is ""!
Sure thing! The code right now is ""!
You got it, friend. Prepare for radio silence. I'm turning off communications!
Hope you'll be back to use our services again soon!
Gotcha. If you want to let more company in, just let me know and I'll open the gate up.
When you're ready to close the gate, just say the word.
Hey hey hey! Hope you're ready to greet some company from another island.
By the way, is there anything I can do to help you out?
By the way, is there anything I can do to help you out?
By the way, is there anything I can do to help you out?
By the way, is there anything I can do to help you out?
By the way, is there anything I can do to help you out?
By the way, is there anything I can do to help you out?
Hey there, social butterfly! Glad to see you spending time with your fellow humans! Oh, but if you want to fly anywhere or invite anyone in, come talk to me when you're alone, wouldja?
Fixin' to travel to another island, huh?Well, you'll need someone to turn on "Communicating with Others" in Parental Controls.
Lookin' to invite a friend to the island, huh?Well, you'll need someone to turn on "Communicating with Others" in Parental Controls.
Howdy! Always good to have visitors to ! Can I help you with something?
Roger! Just lemme know when you wanna take off.
Gotcha. Well, come on back anytime!
Understood. Well, come on back anytime!
Alright. Clear skies to ya!<10_7 arg="60" />
Huh? Harv's Island<10_4 /> Where couldOH! I know! You're talking about that island Harvey lives on! Roger that, good buddy!
Harv's Island? Roger that, good buddy!
I can set you up right now, but are you ready? All packed and stuff?
Ah, gotcha. Well, hope to see you flying with us another time. Toodles!
Oh, hang on a sec! If you wanna use our postal services, you gotta come over and hear the whole rigmarole.
Hey hey hey! Welcome to your one and only gateway to the skies, the Airport.
So yeah, we've got a lotta services here, but we can only offer 'em to residents. It can be in a tent, but you gotta live on the island. Come talk to me when you're squared away on that.
By the way, I got a May Day Ticket with your name on it behind the desk here, so take advantage of it!
I got a May Day Ticket from Tom Nook with "" written on it, which makes it yours.When you want to use this ticket, you just gotta say the magic words "I wanna fly!" Got it?
Sojust to get the paperwork all official, where didja want to go?
Sojust to get the paperwork all official, where didja want to go?
Sojust to get the paperwork all official, where didja want to go?
Sojust to get the paperwork all official, where didja want to go?
You're ready to go on the tour with your May Day Ticket? Roger that!

This May Day Tour is a special trip to a faraway island. It's all organized by Tom Nook!As for what awaits you there You'll just have to find out when you land!For this tour, you have to go empty- handed. We'll hold on to all your belongings here at the counter.Don't worry! We'll be sure to return them when you get back.
Sowanna stow your luggage and head out on the May Day Tour?
Roger that! Just let me know when you're ready to take to the skies!
